version_description:
• fixes an issue with the Bluetooth connection status display
• fixes an issue with the display of Traditional Chinese
• fixes an issue with updating the battery indicator
• fixes an issue with TeleCare where the chat keyboard was hiding the text field
• fixes an issue with TeleCare where subsequent audio/video calls sometimes were unsuccessful
• fixes an issue with TeleCare where the user could not continue working after entering the connection code
